This is a simple app that shows the use of RSS Feed.
Written by Jae Shin and Jihwan Bae

This is a simple app that shows RSS feeds.
1. To add a feeder, enter the URL in the Add a Feeder menu.
2. Check the URL to remove a feeder in the Delete Feeders menu.
3. To save a favorite article, check the start button.
4. Click the favorite menu, to see the collection of your favorite articles.
5. Uncheck the start button, to remove from the favorite collection.
6. Click the sort button to choose an option for sorting.
